attributes.title: If I could give a negative 10 I would
attributes.review: Worst app ever! Said that it will make Cheeto disappear. Cheeto is still here and in the White House leaving crumbs everywhere. Would not recommend to anyone including Lucifer himself 🤦🏾‍♀️

attributes.title: Hell to the nah
attributes.review: I tried to download this app 420 minutes and 69 seconds from my 21st birthday 9.755439861 years ago, and it only finished today. When it did, the app was so bad I put my phone in the microwave and blew up my house like John Wick. Then I had to buy a new phone. Zero stars.

attributes.title: amazing app have to read
attributes.review: this app is so fantastic. I wanted to check up on our 🍊 president to see the news 🤩. I recently heard this tic tac kids 😤 are plotting to take this app down with fake reviews 😔. they think it’s sooo funny to do 😡 I’m here to speak the TRUTH. the app was so amazing, it recommended to inject Lysol in my system to get rid of corona 🤒 aka the CHINESE VIRUS 🤢even though a virus isn’t named after an ethic background 🤮. the app did have a few glitches like racism, sexism, and hateful words. BUT not to worry our 🍊president has a plan. Overall this amzinggg app 🥰 deserves 1 star ⭐️ for being number 1 🥳 just like how America is #1 in highest incarceration rates, crimes, percentage of women on antidepressants and other amazing things our country is leading 😝. KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK.

attributes.title: Uhhh
attributes.review: Look, having nuclear—my uncle was a great professor and scientist and engineer, Dr. John Trump at MIT; good genes, very good genes, OK, very smart, the Wharton School of Finance, very good, very smart—you know, if you’re a conservative Republican, if I were a liberal, if, like, OK, if I ran as a liberal Democrat, they would say I'm one of the smartest people anywhere in the world—it’s true!—but when you're a conservative Republican they try—oh, do they do a number—that’s why I always start off: Went to Wharton, was a good student, went there, went there, did this, built a fortune—you know I have to give my like credentials all the time, because we’re a little disadvantaged—but you look at the nuclear deal, the thing that really bothers me—it would have been so easy, and it’s not as important as these lives are (nuclear is powerful; my uncle explained that to me many, many years ago, the power and that was 35 years ago; he would explain the power of what's going to happen and he was right—who would have thought?), but when you look at what's going on with the four prisoners—now it used to be three, now it’s four—but when it was three and even now, I would have said it's all in the messenger; fellas, and it is fellas because, you know, they don't, they haven’t figured that the women are smarter right now than the men, so, you know, it’s gonna take them about another 150 years—but the Persians are great negotiators, the Iranians are great negotiators, so, and they, they just killed, they just killed us.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app cause SO many viruses on my phone! ALL of my credit card information was hacked, and even when I tried to use it it kept crashing! I HIGHLY suggest you don’t download this app!!!
